messages.message:
I love Microsoft!


`Hi Aaron and team,`
 
We’re releasing a new version of Read 2.0 container! Please find the detail below and the sample helm configuration in the attachment. Don’t hesitate to contact me or Yung-Shin if you have any questions.
 



`Highlights:`
• `Further decrease memory usage for container.`
• `External cache is required for multi-pods setup. For example, set-up Redis for caching.`
• `Fix results missing issue when Redis cache is set-up and ResultExpirationPeroid=0.`
• `Remove request body size limitation of 26MB. Container can now accept >26MB files.`
• `Add time stamp and build version to console logging.`
`Image Path:`
• *`containerpreview.azurecr.io/microsoft/cognitive-services-read:2.0.013250001-amd64-preview (http://containerpreview.azurecr.io/microsoft/cognitive-services-read:2.0.013250001-amd64-preview)`*
`Quality Level:`
• `GA Candidate quality`
• `Suitable for customers preview`
`Known Issues:`
• `MongoDB support for result storage is unstable. We're actively working on improvement.`
